name: CTRLW
description:
This is a simple jumping simulator / Rage game , set in third person and is inspired by altf4

This is a challenging game and will test your eye - hand coordination as well as your patience.

There is no save, no checkpoint, if you die you restart from original spawn location.

This is my first game to be published, please provide your inputs, bug reports to robininteractivestudios@yahoo.com

Hope you folks enjoy this.

Thank you.
